Server.DatabaseModel

Class DatabaseDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • Server.DatabaseModel.DatabaseDriver

  • public class DatabaseDriver
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for reading info from the database.
    Author:
    Gurmukh Singh, Dillon Sahadevan, Eduardo Benetti

      • checkLogin

        public int checkLogin(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String password)
        reads the sign-in info from client. matches the student info with database and returns user status.
        Parameters:
        name - user name
        password - password
        Returns:
        user status if info matches, -1 otherwise
